items.summary: Republish the current CallCraftAI frontend so that the intended production URL is the free Caffeine domain (callcraftai.caffeine.xyz), instead of continuing to show the draft/temporary URL https://create-marketing-website-for-ai-receptionist-servi-ijk.caffeine.xyz/.

Add a lightweight in-app verification indicator (e.g., a small, unobtrusive line in the footer) that displays the current hostname (window.location.hostname) so the user can confirm which domain is serving the live build.
